ClassDesc: A data kind representing a photo for the contact. Some sync adapters will choose to download photos in a separate pass. A common pattern is to use columns @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#DataColumns#SYNC1_E@ through @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#DataColumns#SYNC4_E@ to store temporary data, e.g. the image URL or ID, state of download, server-side version of the image. It is allowed for the @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#CommonDataKinds#Photo#PHOTO_E@ to be null. You can use all columns defined for @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#Data_E@ as well as the following aliases.
